p: Where A 0 characterizes absorbance of the control and A 1 is the absorbance of test samples. Ascorbic acid was used as a positive control. Where A 0 characterizes absorbance of control and A 1 is the absorbance of test samples. All experiments were performed in triplicate and inhibition graphs were made with the help of GraphPad prism program (GraphPAD, San Diego, California, USA).
